claude_messages_content_not_empty.name: claude_messages_content_not_empty
claude_messages_content_not_empty.value: (content IS NOT NULL) AND (length(TRIM(BOTH FROM content)) > 0)

public.user_generation_stats.name: user_generation_stats
public.user_generation_stats.definition: SELECT user_id, count(*) AS total_generations, count( CASE WHEN saved = true THEN 1 ELSE NULL::integer END) AS saved_generations, max(created_at) AS last_generation_date, count( CASE WHEN created_at >= (CURRENT_DATE - '30 days'::interval) THEN 1 ELSE NULL::integer END) AS generations_last_30_days FROM generated_images GROUP BY user_id
